fig.label: FIGURE 2

caption.p: Number of specimens tested and percentage testing positive for influenza, by year — Australia, Chile, and South Africa, April–August (weeks 14–31), 2017–20

fig.span: The figure is a histogram, an epidemiologic curve showing the number of specimens tested and percentage testing positive for influenza, by year, in Australia, Chile, and South Africa, during April–August (weeks 14–31), 2017–20.
